query.statement:
SELECT A.LIFNR ,A.PERNO ,A.NAME1 ,A.TYPE ,A.GUBUN ,A.ACTSS ,A.NAMEE ,A.TEMNO ,A.NAMET ,A.NAMEC ,A.POSIC ,A.POSIT ,A.POSIE --,saphee.decrypt(JUMIN) AS JUMIN ,A.BIRTH, A.PERKEY, A.PSPID ,(SELECT X.ZSITE_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.POSID = A.PSPID) AS ZSITE_NM ,A.ADDRE ,A.CELLP -- ,A.MAJOR ,A.DIRECT ,A.INDIRECT ,TRIM(CHAR(INT(A.CAREY)))||'³â'||TRIM(CHAR(INT(A.CAREM)))||'¿ù' AS CAREYM ,A.INSU1 ,A.INSU2 ,A.INSU3 ,A.INSU4 ,A.ENTER ,A.PICTU ,A.PICTU AS PICTUR ,A.PICTU AS PICTUR2 , '' AS PICTU2 , '' AS TU_FILE_PATH , '' AS TU_SIZE -- ,A.INSUNM||'/'||A.INSUNO AS INSUNO ,A.PICINSU ,A.PICINSU AS PICINSUR ,A.STATS ,'I' FLAG -- ,A.ZTEAM ,A.LOCALMAN , A.NATION , A.DUTY , A.SFT_SHOE, A.SP_SUIT, A.SP_SUIT2, A.WT_SUIT , A.WT_SUIT2, A.VEST ,(SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN '' ELSE 'X' END FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW1904 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.BIRTH||X.NAME1 = A.PERKEY AND X.EDUGBN = '1') AS EDU FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0138 AS A WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.LIFNR = #LIFNR# AND A.PERNO = #PERNO#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
